column4: Hi, can anyone help me? I am trying to encode a video using CLI and ffmpeg and x264. The thing is that I want to trim, deinterlace, and maybe resize the video... any help would be appreciated...
are you trying to create an MP4?
FYI the default ffmpeg in ubuntu repo does NOT support AAC audio (important for MP4, not so much for MKV)
i was just pointing it out - but you obviously already knew.
